attributes.action: Closure of Devon residential homes (Butterpark, Ivybridge & Harewood House, Tavistock
attributes.additional_details: This is to fight against the closure of two Care Homes operated by Devon County Council, which will mean 20 residents in Butterpark, Ivybridge and 17 residents in Harewood, Tavistock losing their homes. These are elderly people who will not cope well with the upheaval of moving somewhere else.
